summary: A handful of Blackshirts commanded by Hierarch Barbagli arrives on Mars.The planet is hostile and scarce water and food. After great discoveries, hilarious adventures and mystical visions, will the fascists be able to go back home?
cast: Simona Banchi|Andrea Blarzino|Valentina D'Alessandro|Valeria Ferrari|Irene Ferri|Caterina Guzzanti|Corrado Guzzanti|Valentina Idini|Marco Marzocca|Paola Minaccioni|Pasquale Petrolo|Annalisa Plantera|Andrea Purgatori|Carla Rak|Andrea Salerno|Carolina Such|Federica Zelada
title: Fascisti su Marte
